Hey! Not sure if this will be helpful to you anymore or not since its been 3 years, but I am also in need of more assistance for CTP. After looking into it, I think that the five -part Cicso Packet Tracer is a part of a larger course called "Computer Networking", that course is about 135 videos long and covers, as the title suggests, lots of great information about Computer Networks, not all of them (very few of them, in fact) use CTP, but the course really helps gain a better concept understanding that may help you understand how CTP works!   Hopefully this helped!
